segments.text: How do I set up an email account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s easy . Go to yahoo.com . Now , click on the link with the picture of an envelope .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That one , the one that says , “ Mail . ”
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . What did I do ? It ’ s asking me for a password .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . See where it says , “ New User ” ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , just fill out this form and choose a password . The computer will do the rest .
segments.speaker: S2
